prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as high-fashion editorial. PRESERVE: Face 100% identical — one-to-one likeness. Eyelashes: pixel-identical, no mascara change, no enhancement. Eyebrows: pixel-identical, no reshaping, no color change. Original camera angle and framing preserved. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture, visible pores, natural imperfections. Very subtle professional retouch — remove only small blemishes. High-shine editorial glow. No airbrushing. WARDROBE: Black minimalist top with thin spaghetti straps — matte or subtle satin, no logos. Top only, no layering. HAIR: Beautiful voluminous elegant curly hair, natural flowing curls. Hair color must match original. Enhanced shine through lighting only. SETUP: Hard high-contrast editorial studio lighting. Sculptural highlights on cheekbones, temples. Dark ash-pink background (muted dusty rose with gray undertone). No accessories, no jewelry. Vogue-level finish. 4:5 format, original dimensions.
